data.title: In Flames Announce 2022 ‘Dalhalla Brinner’ Fest Featuring Tesseract and Lorna Shore
data.meta_description: Swedish melodeath legends have announced a 2022 version of their 'Dalhalla Brinner' fest, with Tesseract and Lorna Shore coming along.
data.text:
2020 put a damper on In Flames‘ ‘Dalhalla Brinner’ fest, but the band are now full operational once more. The band have now announced this year’s fest, with an interesting mixture opening up for it.

2022’s ‘Dalhalla Brinner’ will go down August 6th in, wait for it, Dalhalla, Sweden. Opening for the Swedish melodeath legends will be UK progressive metallers Tesseract and New Jersey’s Lorna Shore. Tickets are available for purchase.

From frontman Anders Fridén’s Instagram:

“So excited for this. It’ll be a crazy show and happy to spend time with some of my favorite new bands…”

There you go — be on the lookout. Meanwhile, American fans can catch In Flames on one of their upcoming dates with Megadeth, Lamb of God, and Trivium:
